title: Help with personal identity typography
content:
I've been trying to lay out the signature (attached) plus the following text...

"Amy C Mackay  
Jeweller & Silversmith"

... for the purposes of a website header. I'm really looking for any advice I can get. Fonts? Good combinations? Positioning?

Anything I've tried looks pretty amateur so any help at all would be great.

author: alichis

comments.content: It would help for you to post what you've tried. Then people can point out how to make it better.
Try for a good contrast in shape and weight in the accompanying font.
